name: BoiBoiAn
description:
BoiBoiAn is a recreation of an Indonesian traditional game called "Boi boi an" in the video game format. For more details about "boi boi an" you can search it on the internet, but here is my simple explanation about the gameplay:

  • This game consists of two team, they are defender team and attacker team
  • Defender team goal is to throw a ball to Attacker team member until all of the member terminated.
  • Attacker team goals are to avoid getting hit by a ball and also, they have to stack all of the rock.

Resources:

  • tennis ball texture: https://www.robinwood.com/Catalog/FreeStuff/Textures/TexturePages/BallMaps.html
  • in world tennis ball sprite: https://www.seekpng.com
  • stack textures: pngegg.com
  • character assets: https://www.gameart2d.com/uploads/3/0/9/1/30917885/catndog.zip
  • background: https://files.craftpix.net/2022/12/093f65e080a295f8076b1c5722a46aa2/craftpix-net...
  • UI assets: https://www.freepik.com/author/upklyak
  • BGM: https://dova-s.jp/_mobile/
  • SFX: mixit, zaplat, pixalbay
  • 3D models (Trees, rocks): http://sketchfab.com/

Notes: 

  • There are some educational features in the game, those are really bad and convoluted actually, I included those features since it is required by my lecturer.
  • only support Indonesian, but it doesn't matter anyway since narrative is pretty much nonexistent.
